department.dept_long_name: Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences

course.title: Electron Microscopy Laboratory
course.meeting_text: M., 2-3:30, and a three-hour laboratory session to be arranged.
course.description: Lectures and laboratory instruction on transmission electron microscopy (TEM) and Cs corrected, aberration-correction microscopy and microanalysis. Lab classes include; diffraction, dark field imaging, X-ray spectroscopy, electron energy-loss spectroscopy, atomic imaging, materials sample preparation, polymers, and biological samples.
course.notes: Primarily for graduate students planning to use TEM for their research.
